verses.text: KO ia ‘oku nofo ‘i he toitoi‘anga ‘o ‘Elioni, ‘Oku mohe ‘i he malumalu ‘o Sātai–
Ko ‘eku lau ē kia Sihova, Ko hoku hūfanga ia mo hoku talitau‘anga: Ko hoku ‘Otua falala‘anga.
Tā ko e hele ‘a e tulimanu te ne fakahaofi koe mei ai, Pea mei he mahaki faka‘auha ‘oku ‘uakai mai.
Te ne ‘ufi‘ufi koe ‘aki hono fulufulu, Pea te ke toi ‘i hono lalo kapakau: Ko ‘ene fai mo‘oni ko ho pā mo fakaū.
‘E ‘ikai te ke manavahē ki he nānunga ‘o e pō, Pe ki he ngahau ‘oku puna ‘aho;
Ki he mahaki ‘oku ha‘ele ‘i he ta‘ehā, Ki he fakamate ‘oku tu‘usi ho‘atā.
‘E tō ‘i ho tafa‘aki ha toko afe, Mo e toko‘i mano ‘i ho to‘omata‘u ē; Kae ‘ikai ofi kiate koe.
Ngata pē te ke sio ‘aki ho mata, ‘O vakai ‘a e totongi ‘a e kau angahala.
He ko koe, ‘Eiki, hoku hūfanga– Tā kuo ke fili ‘a ‘Elioni ko ho nofo‘anga;
‘E ‘ikai fepaki mo koe ha kovi, Pea ‘e ‘ikai ofi ha tā ki ho tēniti.
He te ne kouna ‘ene kau ‘āngelo telia koe, Ke tauhi koe ‘i ho hala fua pē.
Te nau fataki nima koe, Na‘a pākia ‘i he maka ho va‘e.
Ko e laione mo e ngata te ke mala ai; Ko e laione fita mo e tanini te ke molomoloki.
Ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene tu‘u kiate au ‘ene ‘ofa, Ko ia ai, te u fakahaofi ia: Te u ‘ai ke ne mā‘olunga Koe‘uhi ā kuo ne ‘ilo hoku hingoa.
Te ne ui kiate au, pea te u tali; Te u ‘iate ia ‘i he mamahi: Te u hamusi ia mo fakalāngilangi‘i.
Te u ‘ai ‘a e mo‘ui fuoloa ke ne topono ai, Pea te u tuku ke ne māta‘i ‘eku fakamo‘ui.
